name: Name
supportServerLanguageNote: This is an <bold>English-only</bold> support server. While Discohook supports multiple languages for ease of use, our support and moderation teams are usually only able to provide help in English. You can use <anchor>tools like DeepL</anchor> if you are not comfortable with your grasp on the language. Check the box on the left to join the server.
editBackupMessages: To edit the messages in a backup, click the <0/> button.
clickGenerate: Press "Generate" to generate a share link
manageBackups: Visit your user page to import, export, and manage backups.
logInToSaveBackups: Log in to save permanent backups.
sendNoWebhooks: You have no webhooks to send to.
sendNoMessages: You have no messages to send.
orgRedirectTitle: You were just redirected from discohook.org
orgRedirectBody: Discohook is now available at <bold>discohook.app</bold>. To migrate your backups, <importLink>click here</importLink>. To read more about this update, <infoLink>click here</infoLink>.
willBeEdited: This message has its link set, so it will be edited.
skippedEdit: Skipped edit due to mismatched webhook ID.
createdAt: Created on {{ createdAt, MMM D, YYYY }}
createdAtTime: Created {{ createdAt, dddd, MMMM D, YYYY h:mm:ss A }}
successResultTroubleshoot: If you cannot see the message, make sure it wasn't deleted by another bot. Some moderation bots consider all webhook messages to be spam by default.
translatePrompt: Want to help translate Discohook into your language? Check out <0>the translation portal</0> and join <1>the support server</1> to coordinate with us.
invalidWebhookUrl: Invalid webhook URL. They start with https://discord.com/api/webhooks/...
createdAtBy: Created on {{ createdAt, MMM D, YYYY }} by {{username}}
createdByDiscohook: This webhook is owned by Discohook
selectWebhookGuildNote: Select a server that Discohook Utils is in to view its webhooks, or create a new webhook in any of your servers by clicking the button below.
selectWebhookGuildNoWebhooks: The server you selected has no webhooks that Discohook Utils could access. Try creating a new one with the button below.
selectWebhookGuildMissing: Not seeing a server you have permissions in? <0>Try logging in again</0>
selectWebhookGuildManual: You may also <0>input a webhook URL manually</0> (advanced)
noImports: No imports are required for this code.
codeNote: Do not rely solely on a computer to write code for you. <docs>Consult the documentation</docs> for more information. If you need help using {{ library }}, visit its support server, available through the documentation link.
editingBackupNote: You're editing a backup, so your work is saved periodically while you edit. In order to share this message with others, use the "$t(share)" button.
editingLinkBackupNote: You're editing a backup, so your work is saved periodically while you edit.
linkEmbedCacheNote: Discord caches link embeds for 30 minutes. <0>Copy this partially randomized link</0> to force Discord to re-fetch the data. Link embeds are not updated for past messages (you need to edit the message).
cannotChangeChannel: Webhook channel must be set inside Discord or from the <0>server webhooks menu</0>.
webhookCreateSubtitle: You should be returned to the editor shortly.
deleteLinkBackupConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this link embed? This cannot be undone.
noLinkBackups: There's no data here. You can save a link embed in the <0>link embed editor</0>.
noBackups: There are no backups here. You can create a backup on the <0>main page</0> in the "Backups" menu.
openBackupLoad: Start editing this backup without opening a new tab
openBackupClone: Clone this backup and load the duplicated data in the current tab
openBackupNewTab: Open this backup in a new tab
deleteBackupConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this backup? This cannot be undone.
shiftSkipTip: TIP: Hold down shift to skip this confirmation next time.
importOrgPrompt: If you want to import your backups stored on Discohook.org, <0>click here</0>. Otherwise, you can use this menu to import backup files that you have previously exported.
badJsonFile: This is not a properly encoded JSON file.
failedBackupParse: Failed to parse the file. Make sure it is a valid, unmodified backup export.
backupNameDuplicate: <0/> You already have a backup with this name
exportBackupsNote: This menu is for exporting backup files to your computer. This is not really necessary, but it's a great way to copy your messages offline or for use with other bots. Your schedule setup, if any, will only be exported for repeating schedules.
noLinks: You haven't created any share links.
deleteShareLinkConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this share link? This cannot be undone.
refreshShareLink: Refresh the share link for another 2 weeks (Deluxe feature!)
noShareLinkData: Share link data is not kept after expiration. If you need to permanently store a message, use <backups>Backups</backups> instead.
linkEmbedsPremiumNote: You've uncovered a Deluxe feature! <0>Read more about link embeds here.</0>
linkEmbedsPremiumReadOnly: You're currently in read-only mode. You can play around in the editor, but in order to save a link, you will need to subscribe to <0>Discohook Deluxe</0>.
linkEmbedsNoVideoAndDescription: The description is not visible when a video is set.
linkEmbedsImageLimit: Link embeds can have one thumbnail or up to 4 large images, but not both.
linkEmbedsNoVideoAndImage: Link embeds cannot have a video paired with an image. Remove your video in order to add images.
linkEmbedsNoImagesAndVideo: Link embeds cannot have a video paired with an image. Remove all images in order to add a video.
noServers: You don't appear to share any servers with Discohook Utils.
serversFavoriteTip: Click the <icon/> <highlight>star icon</highlight> to favorite a server, making it easier to access while using Discohook. We recommend about 3-5 favorite servers at most.
homeWelcome: Welcome to the homepage. Depending on your permissions in this server, you will be able to access various tabs in the <narrow>top bar</narrow><wide>sidebar</wide>.

homePermission.roles: Your roles grant you some server-wide permissions (not counting channel overrides).

auditLogSubtitle:
Below is a list of actions that have been taken through Discohook for <0>{{guild.name}}. Some expected entries may not be present--for example if a webhook URL was leaked, it's not likely that the attacker would use Discohook.

If you don't recognize a user, you may want to delete the webhook.
scheduleFrequencyNote: Scheduled backups can be no sooner than 2 hours apart from each other. To reset a field to "Every month/day/weekday," remove all chosen options.

createBot.title: Create Bot
createBot.step2: Tap "New Application", type a name, then tap "Create"
createBot.step3: In the "General Information" tab (selected by default), tap "Copy" under "Application ID"

botNoTokenNote: Providing a bot token is optional. When a token is set, your bot can perform actions independently of Discohook Utils.
botTokenOwnerWarning: Make sure your current Discord account ({{username}}) is the owner of this bot or on its team, or else the token will be reset as a safeguard.
botTokenHiddenNote: For security reasons, your token is never shown to you after you save it here. If you have since reset your token, press "Clear Token" and then re-save it.
botsPremiumNote: You've uncovered a Deluxe feature! <0>Read more about custom bots here.</0>
botInteractionUrlNote: Paste this in the "General Information" section in the <0>Discord Developer Portal</0> so that your bot can respond to users.
appSecretUsageNote: In order to register commands, You need to provide either a client secret or a bot token. If you provide a bot token, you don't need the client secret.
appSecretHiddenNote: For security reasons, your secret is never shown to you after you save it here. If you have since reset your client secret, press "Clear Secret" and then re-save it.

deleteBot.title: Delete Bot
deleteBot.note: To delete this custom bot, type its name below. This will not delete the linked Discord application.

triggerEventDescription.1: A member leaves the server (or is removed)

deleteTriggerConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete $t(triggerEvent.{{0}}) and its flow?
troubleshootMessage: If you press the send button and nothing happens, it may be because your browser is blocking connections to Discord, which is not uncommon for privacy-focused extensions like Privacy Badger. Try disabling privacy extensions or entering incognito/private mode.
referenceNoWebhooks: You haven't added any webhooks that match the message link you provided. To overwrite or edit, you will need to add the correct webhook.
invalidMessageLink: Invalid message link. They start with https://discord.com/channels/â€¦ and have three sets of numbers.
componentsNoWebhook: For buttons and select menus to work properly, use a webhook owned by Discohook. Add a webhook for more info.
componentsPossibleWebhook: One or more of your webhooks are owned by an app other than Discohook, so you should only add link buttons. Add a webhook owned by Discohook to use other components.
componentsNoUsableWebhook: None of your webhooks are compatible with non-link buttons, so none will be visible. Add a webhook owned by Discohook.
componentsNotLoggedIn: You aren't logged in, so you can't save this component to your account, and components with flows won't be executed. If you just want display buttons, feel free to check the "$t(disabled)" box.
messageMaxRowsNote: The maximum number of rows per message is {{count}}.
label: Label
componentSaveEditMessageTip: TIP: If you're only editing flows, you don't need to press Edit Message.
componentEditShiftSkipTip: TIP: Hold down shift next time to go straight to the edit page.
deleteComponentConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this $t(component.{{type}}, lowercase)?
author: Author
title: Title
titleUrlManaged: This is set automatically by the main embed in the gallery. Only change this if you want to change which gallery this image belongs to.
actionTypeUnsupported: It looks like this action type is unsupported. Try refreshing the page.
checkFunctionElse: Otherwise, if the function does not pass:
stopMessageNote: Stop actions can optionally show a message to the user. These messages can be <0>formatted</0> like normal message actions.
noMentionsActionNote: No data is available for this list. While logged in, add a webhook or manually insert mentions in the message to populate it.
flowParseNotice: Please resolve these issues before attempting to save the component or submit the message. If you just added a new action, nothing is wrong, you likely just need to populate a required value.
maxActionsWarningFree: Flows have a maximum of {{limit}} non-check/stop actions. <0>Read more about this here</0>. Subscribe to Deluxe to add up to {{premiumLimit}} actions.
maxActionsWarningPremium: Flows have a maximum of {{limit}} non-check/stop actions for Deluxe members.
threadsNote: Webhooks can create & use threads. <0>How do I use this?</0>
forumImmutable: Webhooks cannot change the thread name.
noForumWebhooks: None of your webhooks are in a thread-only channel, so a thread name cannot be set.
profileImmutable: Profile info cannot be changed for existing messages.
messageFlagsNote: Flags are optional message features that can be enabled or disabled.
messageFlagsNoteSuppressNotifications: Any mentions in the message will not be delivered to users.
messageFlagsNoteSuppressEmbeds: All embeds, including link embeds, will not be shown.
rowEmpty: Must contain at least one component (button/select)
labelEmpty: Must have a label or emoji, or both
urlEmpty: Link button must have a URL
optionsEmpty: Must contain at least one select option
embedEmpty: Must contain text or an image
embedsTooLarge: Embeds must contain at most 6000 characters total (currently {{count}} too many)
embedsHidden: You have the "Hide embeds" flag enabled, so all embeds will be hidden.

emojiPickerCustom.stepSend: In Discord, send a message with the custom emoji in it.
emojiPickerCustom.stepCopy: Right click the emoji and select "Copy Link" or select "Copy Text" on the message.

noHistory: This editor session has no history recorded.
historyNote: Here you can view and manage the past 15 autosaved instances of editor history (or 30 with Deluxe). History <bold>does not persist</bold> when you reload the page!
resetEditorConfirm_one: This will delete all of the content in {{count}} message. Are you sure you want to do that?
resetEditorConfirm_other: This will delete all of the content in {{count}} messages. Are you sure you want to do that?
resetEditorConfirmEmbed: This will delete all of the content in one link embed. Are you sure you want to do that?
resetEditorFootnote: If you ever do this by mistake, you may be able to find your lost data in the <0>history menu</0>.
noCacheNote: There's no data here. Add a webhook or insert mentions manually to populate this menu.

timestamp.full: {{ date, MMMM D, YYYY h:mm A }}
timestamp.full_verbose: {{ date, dddd, MMMM D, YYYY h:mm:ss A }}

formatDescription: Some messages can be dynamically templated with a selection of format options shown below. All options must include the curly brackets: <0>{}</0>
formatMemberDescription: The member used here depends on the context of the message. In a component response, it's the member who interacted with the component. For a member join/remove trigger response, it's the member who joined or was removed from the server.
formatServerDescription: This is the server that the formatted message is sent in. In this placeholder, it's the Discohook support server.
formatOptionsNone: Hover over an option above to see an example.

member.name: The member's username
member.bot: Whether the member is a bot
member.created_relative: When the account was created, relative
member.created_long: When the account was created, long-form
member.role_ids: The member's role IDs as an array (for flows)

server.name: The server name
server.members: The number of members in the server
server.roles: The number of roles in the server
server.boosts: The number of boosts the server has
server.emoji_limit: The maximum number of emojis the server can have
server.sticker_limit: The maximum number of stickers the server can have
server.created_relative: When the server was created, relative
server.created_long: When the server was created, long-form
